workflows.title: Logo Design
workflows.description: Create professional logos with AI tools

steps.title: Brand Research & Strategy
steps.description: Define your brand personality and visual direction
instructions: Open ChatGPT in a new tab
Use our brand research prompt template
Answer the follow-up questions about your business
Save the brand summary for the next step
steps.promptTemplate: I need to create a logo for my [business type/industry]. Company name: [your company name]. Target audience: [describe your customers]. Brand personality: [3-5 adjectives]. Help me define: 1) 3 key brand values, 2) Visual style direction (modern/classic/playful/etc.), 3) Color psychology recommendations, 4) Typography style suggestions
tips: Be specific about your target audience
Think about your competitors and how to differentiate
Consider the emotions you want to evoke

steps.title: Design Creation
steps.description: Create multiple logo concepts using templates
instructions: Click the Canva link to open logo templates
Search for templates that match your brand style
Select 3-5 different template styles to customize
Replace text with your company name
Adjust colors based on ChatGPT recommendations
Experiment with fonts and layouts
tips: Try both text-only and icon+text combinations
Test readability at small sizes
Keep it simple - complex logos don't scale well

steps.title: Refinement & Optimization
steps.description: Polish your chosen design and create variations
instructions: Select your best logo concept from step 2
Create horizontal, vertical, and icon-only versions
Use Remove.bg to create transparent background versions
Test the logo on different colored backgrounds
Export in multiple formats (PNG, JPG)
tips: Always test logos on both light and dark backgrounds
Create a favicon version (simplified icon)
Ensure the logo works in black and white

workflows.title: Social Media Graphics
workflows.description: Design eye-catching posts for all platforms

steps.title: Content Planning
steps.description: Plan your social media content strategy
instructions: Define your content goals and target audience
Use ChatGPT to brainstorm post ideas
Choose 3-5 post concepts to design
Plan your visual style and color scheme
steps.promptTemplate: I need social media content ideas for my [business type]. Target audience: [describe]. Goals: [engagement/sales/awareness]. Generate 10 post ideas that would resonate with my audience and include visual suggestions for each.
tips: Mix educational, entertaining, and promotional content
Consider trending topics in your industry
Plan for different post types (quotes, tips, behind-scenes)

steps.title: Visual Creation
instructions: Open Canva's social media templates
Select platform-specific sizes (Instagram post, Story, etc.)
Choose templates that match your brand style
Customize with your colors, fonts, and content
Add high-quality images from Unsplash if needed
tips: Maintain consistent branding across all posts
Use high contrast text for readability
Leave space for platform-specific elements

steps.title: Topic Research & Outline
steps.description: Research your topic and create a detailed outline
instructions: Use ChatGPT to research your blog topic
Generate a detailed outline with main points
Identify key keywords to include
Plan your hook and call-to-action
steps.promptTemplate: I want to write a blog post about [topic] for [target audience]. Help me: 1) Create an engaging title, 2) Develop a detailed outline with 5-7 main points, 3) Suggest SEO keywords to include, 4) Write an engaging opening hook, 5) Suggest a strong call-to-action
tips: Focus on solving a specific problem for your readers
Include actionable tips and examples
Research what competitors have written on the topic

steps.title: Content Writing
instructions: Use your outline to write section by section
Ask ChatGPT to expand on each main point
Include personal insights and examples
Write in a conversational, engaging tone
tips: Write in short paragraphs for better readability
Use bullet points and numbered lists
Include relevant statistics and data

steps.title: Content Strategy & Planning
steps.description: Plan your newsletter content and structure
instructions: Define your newsletter goals and audience
Use ChatGPT to brainstorm content sections
Create compelling subject line options
Plan your call-to-action strategy
steps.promptTemplate: Help me create an email newsletter for my [business type]. Audience: [describe subscribers]. Goals: [inform/sell/engage]. Structure: 1) Create 5 engaging subject line options, 2) Suggest newsletter sections, 3) Write compelling content for each section, 4) Include strong call-to-action ideas
tips: Keep newsletters focused on one main topic
Include both value and promotional content
Test different subject lines to see what works
